roleset.name: to put to use
roleset.note: UTILIZE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls use-105. (from utilize.01-v)
UTILIZATION-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry utilize.01, OntoNotes sense grouping utilization.01; maps to VN class use-105. Framed by Claire. (from utilization.01-n)

roles.note: Mentions of actual utilization "for ..." should be tagged as argM-PRP. (from utilization.01-n)

example.name: utilize-v: transitive
example.text: In addition , the two companies will develop new steam turbine technology , such as the plants ordered [*] by Florida Power , and even utilize each other 's plants at times [*-1]to take advantage of currency fluctuations .
example.arg: [*-1] to take advantage of currency fluctuations

example.name: utilization-n: With Purpose
example.text: The rate of utilization of the aquifer to irrigate crops has increased in recent years.

example.name: utilization-n: No mention of purpose.
example.text: The project will benefit from our utilization of Bob's expertise.

roleset.name: designed for use
roleset.note: UTILITARIAN-J NOTES: Added automatically by Julia. Related to utilize-v (from utilitarian.01-j)

example.text: The interface we built was "utilitarian" -- and that's putting it nicely.
